about_the_game: Immerse yourself in the puzzle adventure world of SUBNET Escape Room Adventure. With each track exclusively composed and produced for the game, the soundtrack delivers a one-of-a-kind experience, creating a distinct atmosphere in every area of the adventure. Whether you're exploring indoor spaces, escaping through outdoor environments, or subterranean subways, the music is masterfully crafted to evoke a range of emotions that heighten the sense of adventure and intrigue. As you progress through the game, the music evolves, elevating the overall experience to new heights. Get ready to embark on an unforgettable journey with the soundtrack of SUBNET Escape Room Adventure.
